'''Joel Tobeck''' is a Kiwi actor who portrayed [[Guritz]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]''. His scenes were filmed for the pickups for the film<ref>''Kiwi Talks'', [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rwlSUHH5LwM #56 - Joel Tobeck Interview (Hollywood, Sons Of Anarchy, LOTR, Taika Waititi, Accents, Agents etc.)]</ref> in 2003.<ref name = "Morphin">''Morphin Network'', [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-93qvUPiBYc  Joel Tobeck (Power Rangers Veteran Voice Actor) Live Stream Interview ]</ref>

The prosthetics for Guritz took five hours to apply and Tobeck became good friends with Make-up artist [[Gino Acevedo]].<ref name = "Morphin"></ref>

Tobeck was initially considered to portray [[Gollum|Sméagol]], prior to his transformation,<ref>''Tolkien Online'', [https://web.archive.org/web/20030425054915/https://www.tolkienonline.com/docs/1054.html Casting News! Sméagol will make a Precioussss Appearance -- Young Sméagol is Cast]</ref> though it was later decided that [[Andy Serkis]] would play him both before and after.<ref>''TheOneRing.net'', [http://archives.theonering.net/movie/cast/tobeck.html TheOneRing.net™ | Movie | Casg | Joel Tobeck is Young Smeagol]</ref>

==Quotes==
{{Quote|I was a little reluctant at first to do it because I was a bit because I'd done a lot of prosthetic work before on Hercules and Xena and other shows that that Pacific Renaissance had made so i was a bit like "Do I really want to do prosthetic makeup?" But then I went "Hang on, hang on. Joel, come on. It's [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|Lord of the Rings]]. It's [[Peter Jackson]]. It's the the biggest trilogy since whatever. Get over yourself.|Joel Tobeck}}
